sentence.Network_en: It must be a hard life, working as a Lumberman in Siberia.
sentence.Network_cn: 在西北利亚当一名伐木工人,生活一定很艰苦.

sentence.Network_en: The lumberman was pinned down to the ground under a heavy tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位伐木工人被一棵大树压在地上.

sentence.Network_en: The lumberman sold his fell at a good price.
sentence.Network_cn: 伐木工把他这季砍的木头卖了个好价钱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: iBriar ... 上钩拳- Uppercut 伐木工- Lumberman 利物浦- Liverpool.
十二级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... lubricate vt. 使润滑 lumberman n. 伐木工人,锯木工人 magnetism n. 磁；魅力；催眠术.

list.abs: In the Far West , lumberman devastated whole forests ., 在远西部地区 , 伐木工曾经破坏了整片森林,

entry.def: A lumberman is a man who sells timber.

list.explanation: [无业游民用语]支着拐棍的乞丐

example.en: The lumberman can beg $ 30 a day with ease.
example.zh: 那个支着拐棍的叫花子一天可以轻而易举地乞讨到30美元。

auth_sentence.content: He had been a lumberman in Maine and a waiter in Hollywood, and he was a self-taught artist.
